message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm offering it at $11,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. What do you think?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but $9,000 is significantly lower than what I had in mind. This product offers you a lot of value, and I believe a price closer to my initial offer would be more fair. How about $11,000? This feels like a good compromise.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $10,500. This is the highest I'm willing to go. Can you consider this compromise?
